headline: Bernstein Reiterates Outperform on Air Products (APD) After Yara Partnership Update
summary: Air Products and Chemicals, Inc. (NYSE:APD) is one of the best hydrogen stocks to buy right now. On December 9, Bernstein SocGen Group reiterated an Outperform rating on Air Products and Chemicals, Inc. (NYSE:APD) stock and kept the price target at $320. The analysts cited Air Products’ update on the negotiations with Yara. The negotiations […]

headline: How New Hydrogen Projects Are Shaping the Story Behind Air Products and Chemicals Valuation
summary: Air Products and Chemicals has seen its fair value estimate revised modestly lower from about $309 to $293 per share as analysts factor in slightly more cautious assumptions. A small uptick in the discount rate to roughly 8.00% and a trim to anticipated revenue growth near 5.72% a year highlight how sentiment remains constructive but more measured while investors await clearer proof of execution on key projects. Stay tuned to learn how you can monitor these evolving targets and the shifting...
